response: the protection of personal information regarding data privacy is a major concern in this digital era. it is important to have control over your online presence and limit the amount of data that companies can access. twitter has taken some measures to protect users' data, but it is still important for users to be cautious when using social media platforms. it is essential to educate people on how to protect their personal information by being aware of privacy policies and adjusting settings accordingly.<|endoftext|>
